skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Ooshio, Asashio-class ship number two~ I served as the flagship of Destroyer Division 8 and did all kindsa things with Asashio, Michishio, 'n Arashio, 'n I was even awarded a few medals~ Then I took some damage 'n Asashio was put in charge, but that's all in the past now. Anyhow, why don'tcha tell me a bit 'bout this fleet?
skins.acquisition: Oh, I found me a talented-lookin' Commander~ "How so"? Cause I saw all them talented-lookin' girls ya got followin' ya~ I'm Ooshio. I'll be countin' on ya'll from now on~
skins.login: Commander, let's stay focused 'n work hard to make everyone happy~
skins.details: Who's yer favorite girl, Commander? Reckon ya could tell me?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Yer makin' me jealous of how yer surrounded 'round the clock by such talented girls~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if yer bored, why don'tcha call some folks over 'n we can have a tea party?
skins.secretaryTouch: Wonder what I oughta make for desert... Ah, ya want some too, Commander? Aw heck, yer puttin' me in a tight spot~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh my, I better tell the others that yer a dangerous one, Commander~

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas~ Commander, we gotta go hand out presents to them destroyers~ You be Santa, I'll be yer reindeer~
skins.acquisition: Merry Christmas~ Commander, we gotta go hand out presents to them destroyers~ You be Santa, I'll be yer reindeer~
skins.details: This costume here's a bit too tight... I oughta get a new one next year...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Oh yeah, whaddya want for Christmas, Commander? I can get it for ya, even if it takes some lookin' 'round.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Christmas is more fun when ya get everyone together 'n throw a big party~
skins.secretaryIdle3: By the end of the year, everyone'll be smilin'~? Hehe, it makes me happy, too~
skins.secretaryTouch: You wonderin' why I wanna be the one handin' out presents? Cause I wanna see those cute smiles on everyone's faces, ya silly~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Well, fine... Think of it as my Christmas gift to you~?

skins.shipDescription: Happy anniversary~ Today's a day to enjoy to yer heart's content, ya know? I'm just havin' fun in my own way, checkin' out cute girls from afar~ I appreciate yer concern though, Commander~
skins.acquisition: Happy anniversary~ Today's a day to enjoy to yer heart's content, ya know? I'm just havin' fun in my own way, checkin' out cute girls from afar~ I appreciate yer concern though, Commander~
skins.login: Fancy a drink, Commander? It's pretty darn nice stuff~ Hehehe, don't be shy now! I might be heckin' drunk, but I won't bite~
skins.details: Wonder if Asashio's here yet... Not done been abducted by some criminal, has she... Am I just worryin' over nothin', Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Albacore, don't go causin' mischief durin' the party, all right? Commander, I reckon you oughta tell her too.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Michishio 'n Arashio almost love Asashio as much as I do~ That's why we all love havin' tea parties with her. You too, Commander, go become buddy buds with her~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, it ain't nice of ya to check out other girls while yer talkin' to me~! Where are yer manners?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander? What're ya starin' at me for...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Gawsh... Girl has a sip of wine 'n this happens... Yer lucky it's me ya did it to~!
